name: BitcoinPriceQuote
0:
”Alexa, open bitcoin price”
”Alexa, start bitcoin price”
”Alexa, launch bitcoin price”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin price
des:
Gets the current price of bitcoin, as well as the percentage of change over the last 24 hours and last 7 days.

Easier and faster to use than other crypto price skills if you're only following bitcoin. Just say "Alexa, open bitcoin price" and you get the exact info you need without having to say anything else.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
